name: Worklytics
headline: Analytics to improve how teams work and collaborate
description: Worklytics identifies leading drivers of employee engagement, without the need for repetitive surveys. It does this by passively analyzing anonymous collaboration data, in tools like Google Workspace and Slack, and detecting patterns that lead to greater employee satisfaction. Worklytics uses these insights to promote positive organizational change by proactively nudging leaders and managers.

founders.name: Erik Schultink, Founder
founders.description: Currently, co-founder / CTO at Worklytics, located in Seattle. Previously spent 6 years in Spain, where I was CTO at Tuenti, a social network / mobile network operator that was acquired by Telefonica. Prior to that, I did my undergrad at Harvard, with some time at Facebook in the middle.

# Insights & data to help your team work better.
[Book a Demo](https://www.worklytics.co/</get-started>)[Learn More](https://www.worklytics.co/</how-it-works>)
![Worklytics integrates with common applications: Google Workspace, Zoom, Salesforce, Slack, Microsoft Teams](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/626a74495350a6a14668f502_hero-integrations.png)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/671047688e5adcbad567d9e3_management_scorecard2.png)](https://www.worklytics.co/</manager-scorecard>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/671044b94a9565de5121504a_Management%20scorecard%20After%20Hours.jpg)](https://www.worklytics.co/</manager-scorecard>)
## Trusted by many of the world’s greatest companies
![Uber](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/6272c86ca5a2b765006c28d5_Uber%20logo%20\(1\).png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/6788586ceb1929a9829a7ea7_Nubank.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/644f349965fb6d245bc7aa3e_BostonD.jpg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/6788589ee0e53fdf1ee18c4a_Asana.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/6788581cf7b064972855740f_Pinterest.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/644f34ae695b422be84df0f1_gallagher.jpg)![Videoamp](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/6272c99061bed40e272628e1_Videoamp%20\(1\).png)![Panasonic](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/6272c485b6634f200683d82c_Panasonic%20logo.png)
![Tucows](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/6272c9135143f8166640a043_Tucos%20logo.png)![Wework](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/6272c81a4a92a9635b906953_Wework%20logo%20\(2\).png)![Iberdrola](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/626a66113caa2c3d11f8e5a0_iberdrola.png)![Nutanix](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/626a6619883012b844a83141_nutanix.svg)
![Telefónica](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/626a661e9336ee04c432a5e2_telefonica.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/644f332ac5e6154e02851e27_Boston.jpg)![Videoamp](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/6272c99061bed40e272628e1_Videoamp%20\(1\).png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/6788581cf7b064972855740f_Pinterest.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/6698fae0dee6354d6fca4908_chevron-left.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/6698faa6a447f3040f3ebb2b_chevron-right.svg)
### Real-Time Data Shows How Work Is Getting Done
Have a hunch that something's not working quite right?Worklytics gives you quick access to reliable, real-time collaboration data so you've got visibility into how work is getting done.
![How many people work healthy workdays chart](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/6271eee5f8913e5e623d1ad4_work-life%20balance%20metrics.svg)
![Meeting effectiveness chart: How many teams are overloaded with meetings?](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/6271f8b80c1a01b3d41f28b2_Meeting%20effectiveness%20metrics%20\(1\).svg)
![Manager metrics chart: Weeks Since Last 1on1 Meeting](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/6271f9843102c52e359c013a_Manager%20metrics%20\(3\).svg)
## The Data You Need to Work Better
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/62691db48f214caffa51728e_hands-up.svg)
### Clean Data You Can Trust
Worklytics data pipelines save enterprise companies thousands of hours of data engineering time.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/6268ffcfc4c1b0bd1c1ff214_lighting.svg)
### Actionable Metrics & Benchmarking
Over 200 metrics carefully designed & tested to model work & collaboration across a range of industries and functions.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/626931409655a0164bc4658e_chart-screen.svg)
### Real-Time Reporting with Live Dashboards
Worklytics self-serve dashboards ensure actionable insights reach the right people at the right times.
## Protect Employee Privacy
Analyze work and collaboration without putting people’s privacy or company data at risk.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/626911dd736374f58256ef9b_person.svg)
### Fully Anonymous
Learn how we anonymize employee data using the Worklytics Pseudonimization Proxy and by aggregating metrics to the group level.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/626ae519a45d3b24a9e8eab1_warning.svg)
### Work Content Never Analyzed
Worklytics does not store or analyze any work content whatsoever. We only use exahust/log data to understand workflow and collaboration.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/626ae519e968851b8e055989_crown.svg)
### Improve Employee Experience
Worklytics is fully focused on improving the day-to-day work-life of employees using only anonymous work data. No creepy browser plugins or software monitoring people’s laptops.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626173f9597b2935e932c8a4/626ae519a29849c95cd7788e_hand-thumb-up.svg)
### GDPR and CCPA Ready
As a Data Processor, Worklytics provides all the reporting and controls required to ensure that you are able to comply with common privacy regulation such as GDPR
[Learn More](https://www.worklytics.co/</privacy>)

**Christine Schmidt**
[Head of People Analytics at Cruise](https://www.worklytics.co/<https:/www.getcruise.com/>)
“…Worklytics is identifying great managers that are operating their teams smoothly, regularly hitting and surpassing targets and offering employees a great experience that helps them feel like they are growing.”
[TechCrunch](https://www.worklytics.co/<https:/techcrunch.com/2018/03/06/worklytics-wants-to-cut-down-on-lame-meetings-and-help-make-teams-more-efficient/>)
“The insights we receive from the tool through automated reports and survey feedback are invaluable. We highly recommend Worklytics if you care about your people.”
Clive Munro
[CTO of Blue Robot](https://www.worklytics.co/<https:/www.bluerobot.com/>)

generated_description:
### Worklytics - Summary

**Company Overview:**
Worklytics is a data analytics platform focused on transforming how teams work and collaborate. Founded in 2016 and part of Y Combinator's W18 batch, the company is based in Seattle, WA. It aims to enhance employee engagement without the hassle of repeated surveys, utilizing anonymous collaboration data from platforms like Google Workspace and Slack.

**Mission:**
The core mission of Worklytics is to leverage analytics to improve team dynamics and collaboration. By passively analyzing co-working patterns, the platform identifies the leading drivers of employee satisfaction and engagement, enabling organizations to implement positive changes effectively.

**Key Features:**
1. **Remote & Hybrid Work Support:** Worklytics offers solutions tailored for teams operating in various work environments, ensuring productivity remains high.
2. **Organizational Network Analysis:** This feature helps map out how collaboration occurs within teams, revealing insights into communication flows and potential bottlenecks.
3. **Burnout & Wellbeing Insights:** The platform actively monitors indicators of employee burnout, allowing managers to take preemptive actions to support their teams.
4. **Predictive Analytics:** By analyzing past trends, Worklytics helps organizations forecast future behaviors and needs within their workforce.
5. **Real-Time Insights Dashboard:** Users gain access to live data reflecting how work gets done, enabling agile decision-making.

**Data Security and Privacy:**
A standout aspect of Worklytics is its commitment to privacy. The platform anonymizes employee data, ensuring that while organizations gain insights into workforce dynamics, individuals’ privacy is steadfastly protected. Worklytics operates with GDPR and CCPA compliance, reinforcing its robust security practices.

**Product Offering:**
Worklytics includes features such as:
- **DataStream:** A work data pipeline that helps organizations streamline their data collection processes.
- **Dashboard:** Real-time insights into team performance and interaction.
- **Benchmarks:** Comparative metrics that allow companies to see how their engagement levels stack up against industry standards.

**Who It's For:**
Whether you’re a leader seeking to understand and enhance your team's productivity or an HR professional looking to foster a healthier workplace environment, Worklytics provides actionable data and insights that are essential for modern organizational management.

### Conclusion
Worklytics is redefining workforce analytics by transforming cryptic data into accessible and actionable insights. With its strong foundation in privacy and data security, it's positioned as a vital tool for organizations aiming to understand and enhance their employee engagement and collaboration strategies effectively.

For more information, check out their website: [Worklytics](https://www.worklytics.co).
